organization.title: The club
content: Welcome to the official site of the Year Japan association!
Founded on the occasion of “the year of Japan in France” in 1997, we invite Grenoble-native fans of Japan and Japanese people living in Grenoble to meet in order to promote cultural exchange.
If you want to exchange in French, or in Japanese, join us, you are all welcome!

group-fb.title: Meet us
content: To meet, or just ask questions, join us on Facebook!
Answer three questions and you will be with us ;-)
We organize warm weekly meetings, but also cinema outings on the theme of Japan, restaurant outings to chat around ramen bowls, or even barbecues to share French and Japanese gastronomy together!

activity.title: Our activities
content: Exchange of languages and regular meeting on Wednesdays
Various seminars: on the analysis of society from the point of view of cognitive science, digital humanities and international law, diseases of language disorders
Reception of Japanese interns and students in Grenoble
Bilateral translation of French, English and Japanese documents
Preparation of a Fr-Jp radio station
